infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio messages for communication.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for custom symbols and user profiles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for symbols and backgrounds.
infoPlist.NSMediaLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to media library to manage audio files.
infoPlist.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: This app needs access to documents folder to save and manage communication books.
